mapper.select: SELECT OGR_FID, INDEXID, NVL(FLAG, 0) AS FLAG FROM CMAQ_9KM_WGS84_2
mapper.update: UPDATE CMAQ_9KM_WGS84_2 SET FLAG = #{flag} WHERE INDEXID = #{indexId}
mapper.select: SELECT CVPL_NO, DATE_FORMAT(CVPL_DT,'%Y년 %m월 %d일 %h시') AS CVPL_DT, CPTTR, CPTTR_CTTPC, CVPL_LC, CVPL_CN, DATE_FORMAT(REGIST_DT,'%Y년 %m월 %d일 %h시') AS REGIST_DT, REGISTER_ID, CHANGE_DT, CHANGER_ID, LEGALDONG_CODE FROM CVPL_MANAGE WHERE DATE_FORMAT(CVPL_DT,'%Y%m%d') >= #{startDate} AND DATE_FORMAT(CVPL_DT,'%Y%m%d') <= #{endDate} AND CVPL_CN LIKE CONCAT('%', #{branchName}, '%')
